original_text: He threw him into the Abyss, and locked and sealed it over him, to keep him from deceiving the nations anymore until the thousand years were ended. After that, he must be set free for a short time.
korean_text: 무저갱에 던져 넣어 잠그고 그 위에 인봉하여 천 년이 차도록 다시는 만국을 미혹하지 못하게 하였는데 그 후에는 반드시 잠깐 놓이리라

sentences.original_text: He threw him into the Abyss
and locked and sealed it over him
to keep him from deceiving the nations anymore
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 더 이상 민족들을 속이지 못하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: until the thousand years were ended
he must be set free for a short time
